item.description: Inspiration A simple Nepali sentence constructor inspired by Nepali Ann’s Itty-Bitty (but darn good) Nepali Language Primer Nepalgo Verbs Notes The order of sentences is reversed in Nepali. The conjugated verb is always last. Sentence structure is: subject + object + verb.
